title: The Getaway Girls: A New Orleans Tale of Monsters, Mayhem and Moms
description: Four girlfriends on a weekend trip to New Orleans attract the attention of flesh-eating Scavengers. The women must rely on their wits, a cocky Irish movie star, and a dodgy deal with vampires to survive the night during this wild adventure through the Big Easy.
author: Deirdre H. Gage
